#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
double abstion(double x)
{
	return (x>0)?x:(-1*x);
}
#define gcx getchar_unlocked
inline long int scan()
{
	long int n=0;
	int ch=gcx();
	while(ch<'0'&&ch>'9')
	{
		ch=gcx();
	}
	while(ch>='0'&&ch<='9')
	{
		n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+ch-'0';
		ch=gcx();
	}
	return n;
}
int main()
{
	long int n,i;
	double a,f,counting=0;
	n=scan();
	char str[n];
	scanf("%s",str);
	scanf("%lf%lf",&a,&f);
	for(i=0;i<strlen(str);i++)
	{
		if(str[i]=='L')
		counting+=a;
		else
		counting-=a;
		if(abstion(counting)>f)
		{
			printf("NO\n");
			return 0;
		}
	}
	printf("YES\n");
	return 0;
}
